title: Whats On My iPhone 15 Pro Max - a month later!
description: Thanks to Eight Sleep for sponsoring a portion of this video. Use my code IJUSTINE for $200 off the Pod Cover:    PLEASE SUBSCRIBE:  GET MY PINK iJUSTINE CABLES HERE:   GET MY EDITING PLUGIN:    MUSIC I USE:    GET YOUR OURA RING:    FRIEND ME HERE:        MY NEW PROJECT:   PODCAST:       WHAT I USE TO MAKE VIDEOS    CAMERAS: Sony a7 IV -  Sony a1 -   Sony a7s III -   Insta 360 ONE X3 -  Insta 360 ONE RS -  Insta 360 GO2 -   LENSES: New Sony GM 24-70mm ii -  Older Sony GM 24-70mm -  New Sony Sony 20-70mm -  Sony GM 16-35mm -  Sony GM 50mm -  Sony GM 135mm -  Sony GM 85mm -
transcript: - Hey, everyone. So it's been a few months since I got my iPhone 15 and I thought I would do a little updated what's on my iPhone. I changed some things around from my previous phone because normally, when I get a new iPhone, I completely start from scratch, which is kind of annoying because I have to redownload all of the apps. But I love it because it's a fresh start on my phone. What I don't like is I do end up losing all of my messages, but it just feels like a fresh start every year. So let me show you guys what I have on my phone and how I have it laid out. I don't like a lot of pages. I don't like having more than two pages. So as you'll see here, I have one page, two page, and I have some folders for some things like my crypto, my house, and then I have shopping, production, travel, and healthcare and fitness, which there's actually not that many things in there, but that's fine. The number one thing that you will see though is I do have my Eight Sleep widget up here. So a huge thank you to Eight Sleep for sponsoring a portion of this video. Before we get into the rest of the apps, I wanna just tell you what it's been like for over the past year of using Eight Sleep. If you don't know what Eight Sleep is, it is basically a game changer when it comes to getting the best sleep ever. Like when I say that this thing has changed my life, no joke, it is so incredible. So Eight Sleep has a mattress and a pod cover that is temperature-controlled so it'll either heat up or cool down according to how you like to sleep. And it has made such a huge difference. For me, I like to fall asleep with a little bit colder of a temperature. So as you'll see here, my pod is currently off, but I can click in through the widgets. And right now, it's warming it because it's actually currently at negative three. It's a little bit colder in my house at this point. So for me, I like to fall asleep at about a negative two. So this right now is currently at a negative two for bedtime. So I can have this set for all nights since that is my current preference. And with autopilot, it automatically will adjust to make sure that I'm at my ideal temperature that I like. My favorite part though is I hate having an alarm wake me up. So I can have this do a gentle vibration on my half of the bed, and it'll also warm up to a warmer temperature. So it's like a gradual, very peaceful way to wake up. I've also loved having both sides of the bed be separate. So if your partner likes to have a colder temperature or a warmer temperature, your bedsides can be separate and each one of you can sleep at the ideal temperature. The other added bonus is this has sleep tracking, which I'm so obsessed with. This shows your your sleep fitness score. I had an incredible sleep there, 100%. 93% routine, and I slept for eight hours and 32 minutes. And I love the detail that this goes into with your different sleep stages. Also, your health metrics, your heart rate, HRV, your breath rate, your routine, your schedule consistency, your sleep latency, the time you went to sleep, and it's just so fun to be able to compare this night after night. Like I think I had to fly out this day, so you can see I woke up at 5:30. And then the next day, there's no data because I was gone and sad because I missed my Eight Sleep. Since having this for the past year, I honestly cannot say enough great things about it and I know I'm not the only one. I have so many other friends who also have this, and I love being able to chat with them about their sleep scores and how much this has improved their sleep as well. If you guys wanna get more information, I'll put a link in the description and let me know if you have one or if you are looking to get one, I would love to hear from you. So this is my second home screen, but let's go back and let's go through all of the apps that I currently have and my organizational thought process.
